languages.text: "Прошу, Ваша Светлость... Эти грязные вещи не стоит повторять".
"I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, Ваша Светлость... Эти грязные вещи не стоит повторять".

traits.locale_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich wage es nicht, diese Verleumdungen zu wiederholen."
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich wage es nicht, diese Verleumdungen zu wiederholen."

languages.text: «Le ruego que me perdone, mi{mf|lord|lady}... pero no me atrevo a repetir sus calumnias».
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me perdone, mi{mf|lord|lady}... pero no me atrevo a repetir sus calumnias».

languages.text: 「お許しください、陛下…こんな汚い言葉を繰り返す勇気はありません」
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください、陛下…こんな汚い言葉を繰り返す勇気はありません」

languages.text: “我请求您的原谅，大人……我不敢重复这种无耻之辞。”
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

traits.locale_text: “我请求您的原谅，大人……我不敢重复这种无耻之辞。”

languages.text: « Ne m'en veuillez pas, Votre Seigneurie... mais je n'ose répéter devant vous ces affreuses calomnies. »
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."

traits.locale_text: « Ne m'en veuillez pas, Votre Seigneurie... mais je n'ose répéter devant vous ces affreuses calomnies. »

languages.text: "Affınızı rica ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kötülemelerini tekrar etme cüretinde bulunamam."
languages.original_text: "I beg forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I dare not repeat this slander."
